properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Name of matchless splendor! Name all other names above! Glorious Son of God incarnate, King of kings, and Lord of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanks we give, and adoration, Every day and every hour, For an uttermost salvation, Freedom from sin’s guilt and power.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Earth to Him her face upraises, Knows Him as the great I AM! Heaven resounds with Jesus’ praises, Glory to the bleeding Lamb!{/lang-eng}
